shortdesc.ph: Transcoding configurations for CDN live streaming.

pd.p: The width of the output media stream in pixels. The default value is 360.

ul.li: When pushing video streams to the CDN, width is less than 64, Agora server automatically adjusts it to 64.
When pushing audio streams to the CDN, width as 0.

pd.p: The height of the output media stream in pixels. The default value is 640.

ul.li: When pushing video streams to the CDN, height is less than 64, Agora server automatically adjusts it to 64.
When pushing audio streams to the CDN, height as 0.

plentry.pd: The width and height of the output media stream in pixels.
The video bitrate (Kbps) of the output media stream. The default value is 400. You can refer Push streams to CDN set this parameter.
The video frame rate (fps) of the output media stream. The default value is 15, and the value range is [1, 30].The Agora server adjusts any frame rate higher than 30 fps to 30 fps.

dlentry.dd: This attribute is deprecated since v2.8.0, and Agora does not recommend it.

plentry.pd: The video GOP (Group of Pictures) of the output media stream. The default value is 30.

pd.p: The video encoding specifications of the output media stream. See .
pd.note: If you set this parameter to any other value, Agora adjusts it to the default value.

plentry.pd: The codec type of the output video. For details, see .

pd.p: Transcoding configurations of each host. One live streaming channel supports up to 17 hosts. For more details, see .

plentry.pd: The user SEI information embedded in the output media stream. This parameter is used to send SEI information to the CDN. The maximum length is 4096 bytes. For more details, see SEI-related questions 。

The video background color of the output media stream. The format is a hexadecimal integer defined by RGB without the # symbol. Such as For example, 0xFFB6C1 means light pink. The default is 0x000000 , which means black.
The number of hosts in the transcoding. The default value is 0.

Deprecated: This attribute is deprecated.
The metadata sent to the CDN client.
The number of background images on the live video. See . You can add a background image or use an array to add multiple background images. This parameter is used with backgroundImageCount.

pd.p: Deprecated as of v3.6.0. Use backgroundImageArray instead.
The number of background images on the live video. The image format needs to be PNG. See .
Deprecated as of v3.6.0. Use backgroundImageList instead.
The number of background images on the live video. Ensure that the format of the watermark image is PNG. See .

plentry.pd: The watermark on the live video. Ensure that the format of the watermark image is PNG. See . You can add one watermark, or add multiple watermarks using an array. This parameter is used in conjunction with watermarkCount.

pd.p: Deprecated as of v3.6.0. Use watermarkArray.
The watermark on the live video. The image format needs to be PNG. See .
Deprecated as of v3.6.0. Use watermarkList.
The watermark on the live video. The image format needs to be PNG. See .

plentry.pd: The watermark on the live video. Ensure that the format of the watermark image is PNG. See . You can add one watermark, or add multiple watermarks using an array.
The video background image of the output media stream. For more details, see .

pd.p: The number of watermarks (watermark) of the output media stream.

ul.li: If you do not add a watermark or add only one watermark, this parameter is optional.
If you add more than one watermarks, ensure that you set this parameter.

plentry.pd: The audio sampling rate (Hz) of the output media stream. See . .
The audio bitrate (Kbps) of the output media stream. The default value is 48, and the maximum is 128.

The number of audio channels of the output media stream. The default value is 1. Agora recommends setting it to 1 or 2.
1: (Default) Mono
2: Stereo.
3: Three audio channels.
4: Four audio channels.
5: Five audio channels.
The audio codec of the media stream. For more details, see .

An array of watermarks on the live video. See . You can add one or more watermarks using watermarkArray. The image format needs to be PNG. The total number of watermarks and background images on a live video must be greater than or equal to 0 and less than or equal to 10.

The number of watermarks on the live video. The total number of watermarks and background images must be greater than or equal to 0 and less than or equal to 10. This parameter is used with watermark.

An array of background images on the live video. See . You can use backgroundImageArray to add one or more background images. The image format needs to be PNG. The total number of watermarks and background images on a live video must be greater than or equal to 0 and less than or equal to 10.

The number of background images on the live video. The total number of watermarks and background images must be greater than or equal to 0 and less than or equal to 10. This parameter is used with backgroundImage.

An array of watermarks on the live video. See . You can add one or more watermarks using watermarkArray. The image format needs to be PNG. The total number of watermarks and background images on a live video must be greater than or equal to 0 and less than or equal to 10.

The number of watermarks on the live video. The total number of watermarks and background images must be greater than or equal to 0 and less than or equal to 10. This parameter is used with watermark.

An array of watermarks on the live video. See . You can add one or more watermarks using watermarkList. The image format needs to be PNG. The total number of watermarks and background images on a live video must be greater than or equal to 0 and less than or equal to 10.

An array of background images on the live video. See . You can use backgroundImageArray to add one or more background images. The image format needs to be PNG. The total number of watermarks and background images on a live video must be greater than or equal to 0 and less than or equal to 10.

The number of background images on the live video. The total number of watermarks and background images must be greater than or equal to 0 and less than or equal to 10. This parameter is used with backgroundImage.

An array of background images on the live video. See . You can use backgroundImageList to add one or more background images. The image format needs to be PNG. The total number of watermarks and background images on a live video must be greater than or equal to 0 and less than or equal to 10.
